title: [Site Update] Discussion creation process change
body:
Greetings summoners,

We just pushed a change to the PBE boards: you now have to go to an individual sub-community to create a discussion, you can no longer do it from the homepage. We hope this extra step will help you figure out the best place for your discussion to thrive!

replies.body:
I'm okay with this, it will probably help mitigate the mistaken locations.

Thank you for the update!
